price: او پنځم (ځل به ووايي) چې كه هغه درواغجن وي، نو د الله لعنت دې ورباندې وي.
arabic: وَٱلۡخَٰمِسَةُ أَنَّ لَعۡنَتَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡهِ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wal-khāmisatu anna laʿnata al-lahi ʿalayhi in kāna mina al-kādhibīna
